name: py-tornado
description: Tornado is a Python web framework and asynchronous networking library.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-singledispatch
dependencies.description: This library brings functools.singledispatch to Python 2.6-3.3.

dependencies.name: py-certifi
dependencies.description:
Certifi: A carefully curated collection of Root Certificates for
validating the trustworthiness of SSL certificates while verifying the
identity of TLS hosts.

dependencies.name: py-backports-abc
dependencies.description:
Backports_ABC: A backport of recent additions to the 'collections.abc'
module.

dependencies.name: py-futures
dependencies.description: Backport of the concurrent.futures package from Python 3.2

dependent_to.name: py-luigi
dependent_to.description: Workflow mgmgt + task scheduling + dependency resolution

dependent_to.name: py-matplotlib
dependent_to.description:
Matplotlib is a comprehensive library for creating static, animated, and
interactive visualizations in Python.

dependent_to.name: py-visdom
dependent_to.description:
Visdom aims to facilitate visualization of (remote) data with an
emphasis on supporting scientific experimentation.

dependent_to.name: thrift
dependent_to.description:
Software framework for scalable cross-language services development.
Thrift combines a software stack with a code generation engine to build
services that work efficiently and seamlessly between C++, Java, Python,
PHP, Ruby, Erlang, Perl, Haskell, C#, Cocoa, JavaScript, Node.js,
Smalltalk, OCaml and Delphi and other languages.

dependent_to.name: py-jupyterlab
dependent_to.description:
JupyterLab is the next-generation web-based user interface for Project
Jupyter.

dependent_to.name: py-bokeh
dependent_to.description: Statistical and novel interactive HTML plots for Python

dependent_to.name: py-ipyparallel
dependent_to.description: IPython's architecture for parallel and distributed computing.

dependent_to.name: py-flexx
dependent_to.description: Write desktop and web apps in pure Python.

dependent_to.name: py-sentry-sdk
dependent_to.description: The new Python SDK for Sentry.io

dependent_to.name: py-terminado
dependent_to.description: Terminals served to term.js using Tornado websockets
